page.title: 14DAY IN THE LIFE OF LIANNE
page.content: Today I got up at a quarter to eight to face a bright sunny morning. I washed, dressed, plaited my hair and put my sandwiches in my bag. I ate breakfast with the rest of the family and watched T.V. a.m. before going to school. In our morning service Mr. Williams told us a story and then we went back to our classroom to work. We did Maths until playtime. Last week in playtimes we played skipping, this week it is tennis. After we went back to our class for English and Reading. We ate our sandwiches during lunchtime and played in the yard. Then we did some topic work and after play Mr. Rees took us to practise Athletics. It was then time to go home for tea and to watch television until 5.15 pm. After playing outside for a while, I had my supper and got ready for bed.
